title: Checkout Step Completed Event Data
description: Data payload for the ecommerce.checkout_step_completed event. Fired when a user completes a step in a multi-step checkout flow.

step.description: The step number in the checkout flow (1-indexed).

stepName.description: The human-readable name of the checkout step (e.g. 'Shipping Address', 'Payment').

shippingMethod.description: The shipping method selected during this step, if applicable (e.g. 'standard', 'express', 'overnight').

paymentMethod.description: The payment method selected during this step, if applicable (e.g. 'credit_card', 'paypal', 'apple_pay').
